title: The Lost Umbrella
paragraph: On a rainy morning, Maya rushed to catch her bus. She grabbed her things but forgot her umbrella. When she arrived at work soaked, her colleague offered her a dry jacket and some tea. Later that day, the sun came out, and she laughed about her forgetfulness. She decided to keep a spare umbrella at work just in case.

title: The Secret Recipe
paragraph: Leo had always wanted to bake the perfect chocolate cake. After weeks of testing, he finally discovered that adding a pinch of salt made the flavors richer. His friends couldn’t believe how good it was and kept asking for the recipe—he just smiled and said it was a secret. He wrote the final recipe down and locked it away.

title: The Astronaut’s View
paragraph: Orbiting the Earth, astronaut Asha looked out of the window and saw the curve of the planet beneath her. The sunrise stretched across the horizon in shades of orange and pink. Floating in zero gravity, she felt both small and inspired by the beauty of the world. She captured the view with her camera to remember the moment.
